SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM article AS A WHERE A.boardId = #{boardId}
AND ( A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR A.body LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') )
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND A.body LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND A.delStatus = 0
SELECT A.*, IFNULL(M.name, "삭제된회원") AS extra__writerName FROM article AS A LEFT JOIN member AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.id = #{id} AND A.delStatus = 0
SELECT A.*, IFNULL(M.name, "삭제된회원") AS extra__writerName FROM article AS A LEFT JOIN member AS M ON A.memberId = M.id order by regDate desc LIMIT 10
SELECT relId, count(*) as cnt from reply where date_add(updateDate, interval 1 MONTH) > NOW() AND delStatus = 0 group by relId order by cnt desc limit 10
